<<<<<<< HEAD
The faithful testimony of that antient servant of the Lord, and minister of the everlasting Gospel William Dewsbery his books, epistles and writings, collected and printed for future service. Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
[16], 405 p.
Printed and sold by Andrew Sowle ..., London : [1689]
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Pages 138-163 and 202-223 filmed from the Union Theological Seminary Library and spliced at end. Testimonies and biographical sketches by George Whitehead, George Fox and others. [14] p.
=======
